Class SavingsAccount

java.lang.Object
SavingsAccount
public class SavingsAccount
extends java.lang.Object
This class has the functionality of a savings account It provides functions that allow the user to interact with the account
Author:
Karlee Fidek

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    SavingsAccount()
    initial constructor initializes all the values in the class

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void calculateBiweeklyInterest()
    calculates biweekly compound interest and updates savings balance
    void calculateMonthlyInterest()
    calculates monthly compound interest and updates savings balance
    void deposit​(double amount)
    deposits given amount into the savings account
    int getMonthlyCount()
    returns monthly counter of how many times user withdrew money from the account
    double getSavingsBalance()
    allows user to retrieve current savings balance
    void modifyAnnualInterestRate​(double rate)
    sets the annual interest rate to provided value
    void setSavingsBalance​(double savings)
    assigns provided value as users' savings balance
    void withdraw​(double amount)
    Withdraws amount specified by user.

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • withdraw

      public void withdraw​(double amount)
      Withdraws amount specified by user. Lets user know if withdrawal amount is too high. Lets user know if they have exceeded the monthly withdrawal limit.
      Parameters:
      amount -
